CNN's Chief International Anchor and host of the nightly global affairs program "Amanpour." She also hosts "Amanpour & Company" on PBS. A highly respected journalist, she has reported from major conflict zones and interviewed numerous world leaders.

Lead political anchor for CNN and the anchor of "The Situation Room with Wolf Blitzer." A veteran journalist, he has been with CNN since 1990, covering major political stories, U.S. presidential elections, and international news.
